caption: This song contains an acoustic drum playing a simple groove along with an upright bass. A piano is playing short chords along with the snare of the drums. Trumpets are playing a melody along with the male voices singing together in unison and other harmonies. In the background you can hear a synth string chord and plucks playing a little melody. This song may be playing in a theater while watching a musical.
